test_scenarios.name: New User Sign-Up & Login
steps: Click on 'Sign Up' or similar CTA.
Enter required details (email, password, company name).
Successfully log in with created credentials.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Card Transaction
steps: Ensure a card is active and has sufficient credit/funds.
Make a purchase using the Ramp card.
Verify transaction appears in the Ramp dashboard within a reasonable timeframe.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Transaction details (amount, merchant, date) are accurately displayed in the transaction history.

test_scenarios.name: Submit an Expense with Receipt
test_scenarios.expected_result: Expense is successfully submitted and visible in the 'Expenses' list with status 'Pending' or similar.
